help-file.title: MEMORIZE PRAY FORGET
help-file.content:
Syntax: memorize | pray (while resting) memorize <spellname> | pray <spellname> (while resting) forget <spellname>
"Memorize" and "Pray" let you put a spell in your active repertoire. To successfully memorize or pray for a spell, you must be holding or have in your inventory the appropriate item, dependent on your class. Magic-User subclasses must have a spellbook which contains the scribed spell to successfully memorize it.
Memorizing or praying without specifying a spellname allows you to resume your studies/prayers and lists the time remaining to complete each spell.
"Forget" lets you purge a spell from your active repertoire.
